responses.rationale: The segment reports financial data and lacks explicit calming language.
Reports a low-risk fact but immediately follows with potential future risk; lacks explicit calming language or amplification of low risk.
The segment reports a technical detail about a vaccine trial and lacks explicit calming language.
The segment reports actions and new cases and lacks explicit calming language.
